Package cchase.platformergame

Class Enemy

java.lang.Object
cchase.platformergame.Player
cchase.platformergame.Enemy
public class Enemy extends Player
Enemy.java Enemy object. This class serves as a template for future enemy objects. Enemy extends from Player, and has its input() method overridden. Enemy also has a modified updateBattle and renderBattle method.

      public void renderMovement(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch spriteBatch)
      Description copied from class: Player
      renderMovement() controls movement and will display the correct sprite depending on what action is being performed The method uses drawSprite(), and changes by using the enum State. TODO: Implement a new variable to position.x and position.y. I'd like to offset the sprite if it is necessary

    • renderBattle

      public void renderBattle(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch spriteBatch, float delta, float scale)
      Description copied from class: Player
      renderBattle is a render screen that is used for the battle screen. When in battle the player cannot move and they are locked into the standing animation (for now... until I figure out what animation is)
      Overrides:
      renderBattle in class Player
      Parameters:
      spriteBatch - SpriteBatch
      delta - float
      scale - float, how large the sprites will be rendered.
